page.title: 18The Half Moon Pub,Plumpton
page.content: The Pub was made of flint and wood in 1841 as an Inn.The opening times are 10.30am to 2.30pm and 6.00pm to 11.00pm.The busiest time of opening is Saturday night. The most popular drink now is Lager. The landlord sells Â£170 worth of cigarettes each week.He replaces his gambling machines every three months because peolpe get bored with them. He has two beer gardens at the back. The brewery that supplies the drink is Phoenix.They had a childrens play area out the back of the pub.They were burgled in June 1985 and lost Â£400 in change.The pub has always been called the Half Moon. He has 100 glasses to drink from. The landlords name is Cherry White. He lives in his pub like 99% of land- lords do.The grid reference of the pub is 364132.
